content.rendered:
The better I get to know humans, the more I find myself loving dogs.

The most precious thing in my life is my dog ‘JOY’🐶
No matter how worst my mood is she finds her way to make me laugh out loud. I bought this insanely perfect cute adorable creature when I was at my worst and what she did to me was unbelievable, her aura brought luck and confidence.
It didn’t matter to her how I looked, what mattered to her was how much I give her my time, love and care.

Dog Memorial Tattoo

Investing my love in something like this gave my life a purpose and a new perspective.
And the best part is, she doesn’t even know how awesome and perfect she is for me. I can never give her the same amount of love in return. But I m trying my best and this is me trying to get her on my body. Until the last day.

The world would be a better place if everyone had the ability to love as unconditionally as a dog, it’s the only thing on earth that loves u more than he loves himself.
This particular tattoo is for my partner in crime ‘JOY’.
